data.title: Facial Plastic Surgeon Columbus, OH
data.meta_description: Info about Stephen P. Smith, Jr., M.D. in Columbus, OH who provides services, like microneedling, lip augmentation, and Kybella.
data.text:
Meet Stephen P. Smith, Jr., M.D. - Facial Plastic Surgeon

Dr. Stephen Smith is a fourth-generation Central Ohio surgeon, double-board certified in Facial Plastic & Reconstructive Surgery and Otolaryngology-Head & Neck Surgery. After graduating from The Columbus Academy, he studied Architecture at the University of Pennsylvania. During his time in Philadelphia, Dr. Smith focused on studying the concepts and practice of design and received a minor in Art History.

Dr. Smith graduated summa cum laude from The Ohio State University College of Medicine in 2001 and served as Chapter President of the AOA Medical Honor Society. Following a one-year surgical internship at Mt. Carmel Health in Columbus, Ohio, Dr. Smith completed an Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery residency at The Ohio State University College of Medicine where he received the Medical Director’s Citizenship Award. During residency, Dr. Smith’s artistic background drew him to a career in facial plastic and reconstructive surgery. He went on to complete a fellowship at The American Academy of Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery in Latham, NY, with Edwin F. Williams, III, MD, an international leader in the field.

POSTGRADUATE TRAINING

Fellow of the American Academy of Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery 2006-2007. Williams Center for Facial Plastic Surgery, Latham, New York

Administrative Chief Resident, Department of Otolaryngology 2005-2006. The Ohio State University College of Medicine and Public Health

Residency in Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery 2002-2006. The Ohio State University College of Medicine and Public Health

Internship in General Surgery 2001-2002. Mount Carmel Health System, Columbus, Ohio

EDUCATION

Medical Doctorate, Summa Cum Laude 1997-2001. The Ohio State University College of Medicine and Public Health

Bachelor of Arts, Design of Environment (Architecture & Design) 1988-1992. University of Pennsylvania

Graduate, 1984-1988. The Columbus Academy, Columbus, Ohio

Director, Division of Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery Department of Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery, The Ohio State University

Co-Fellowship Director Facial Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery Head and Neck Oncology Combined Program. 2009-2010. The Ohio State University

Assistant Professor, Department of Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery The Ohio State University College of Medicine and Public Health

Affiliate Team Physician, Sports Medicine Program The Ohio State University Medical Center

Co-Chairman, Foundations in Craniomaxillofacial Surgery Columbus, Ohio. August 2010

Co-Chairman, Facial Trauma & Reconstruction: An Interdisciplinary Approach Regional Resident Educational and Cadaver Dissection Course, June 6-7 2009, Columbus, Ohio

Co-Director, The Ohio State University Department of Otolaryngology Rhinology and Rhinoplasty Dissection Course, April 2009 and May 2010

Instructor, The Nose: Inside and Out University of Virginia, Rhinoplasty Dissection Course Charlottesville, VA, October 2, 2008

Clinical Instructor & Attending Physician Albany Medical Center, Albany, NY 2006-07

Clinical Instructor & Attending Physician Stratton VA Hospital, Albany, NY 2006-07
